block.p: DAVIS-Howland, 84, of Tivoli, NY and NY, NY, July 29, 2000. Husband of Frances Fabyan Davis; father of Howland S., Robert L., George F., and F. Dennie. A memorial service will be 11:00am Tuesday at St. Paul's/Trinity Parish, Tivoli. Memorial contributions may be made to NY Institute for Special Education, 999 Pelham Parkway, Bronx, NY 10469 or to Saugerties Lighthouse Conservancy, PO Box 654, Saugerties, NY 12477 or to St. Paul's Church, PO Box 68, Tivoli, NY 12583. For information contact Burnett, Rockefeller & Hand Funeral Home, 7461 S. Broadway, Red Hook, NY.
DAVIS-Howland (''Bunk''). A friend to many. We grieve the loss of our lifetime member. Our ''national treasure'' will always be remembered. The Edgewood Club of Tivoli
